website_summaries.verdict: Although the design isn't as functional as some pricier options, this case is a good choice for any iPhone as well as consumers who want waterproof protection on a budget.
pros: Features a universal design that fits iPhones, including the 8 and 8 Plus
Components snap securely in place for waterproof protection
cons: Most phone functions won't work while the phone is in the case, with the exception of the volume button for photos
Lacks clarity about how long it can be underwater

customer_reviews.title: Water park tested!
customer_reviews.text: Several trips to the water park with complete submersion for hours and not a drop of water inside. These are not all the same. I just left a 1 star review for a similar product. I will post the same photo here. The two were bought at the same time and used at the same time in the exact same conditions by me and my wife. The other product leaked badly. This one did not. Since this photo was taken, I have used it another 3-4 times at the water park and it has never leaked.
customer_reviews.author: The GongsTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this case to anyone unless you're willing to risk ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone case FAILED me BIG TIME!! I purchased this waterproof case for my iPhone 6 Plus, I followed all the instructions and even conducted the paper test before using it on my phone. My phone is now dead due to water damage because the case failed to keep the water out. I do not recommend this case to anyone unless you're willing to risk damaging your phone permanently.
customer_reviews.author: VanLikesToShop

customer_reviews.title: Joto really is a fun word, isn't it?
customer_reviews.text: Dropped this in the water with my phone in it and it survived. That means it's already paid for itself like 40 times over. 4 stars cause the locking mechanisms are finger nail busters (gotta be a better way, right?) and it's just slightly too big to comfortably fit in any of my pockets. The lanyard kills your neck if you keep a phone in there. Not really problems when you consider that it does what it's intended to do. I don't think I would trust this submerged in water for hours, but it'll save you when you have that uh oh moment while on the water. That and Joto Bag is fun to say.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Survived swimming w/ whale sharks & canyoneering!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got back from an adventurous trip to the Philippines where this dry bag helped me take photos through all our adventures. We swam with whale sharks in salt water seas, swam through cold canyon waters, jumped through cliffs/waterfalls into the bluest waters, and traveled along several islands with this bag keeping my iPhone 6s and cash safe and dry! You can see the white dry bag on my neck when I swam with the whale sharks and the photo of me jumping into the canyon waters was taken with my phone in the dry bag. No problems with it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive “JOTO” cases
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 cases for my family. 1 pink and 2 Black for IPhone 8 Plus. I tested the pink case and it passed. I’m not even attempting to open the black ones. The packaging is different and cheap from the pink one. The black cases do not have the brand “JOTO” displayed on it and I feel after readings the reviews, the brand is the reason I ordered it. The instructions are in 2 different languages. The pink case instructions are all in English. I’m not sure what happened but I’m not happy especially since I can’t return it and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaCo722

customer_reviews.title: I've gone scuba diving about 8 times with this - ...
customer_reviews.text: I've gone scuba diving about 8 times with this - it works with wetsuits and kept my Mazda car keys clear and dry. I've gone down to about 75 feet with it and encountered no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Faulty/ assembly
customer_reviews.text: My husband was unable to even try using this in the water. It came off of his vest while he was leaning over in the boat and the waterproof case as well as his phone is floating somewhere in the Gulf of Mexico resulting in the purchase of a new phone. Product is not reliable and needs a new stronger and more reliable clip design. I normally do not write negative reviews but the loss of an i phone due to a defect warrants advisement before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Poor design with no return policy!
customer_reviews.text: Once latched it is nearly impossible to unlock it without a tool. I have purchased two and one came with much improved design while another one came with older design. There is NO return on these items so buyers beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Cannot press the white button to take a picture
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my Galaxy S6 when we went snorkeling. The first 15 minutes in the water, I was able to take a picture or record a video. But after a while, it seemed that the plastic of the case had become hard and rigid in the water . The Home button did not work through the case. Sometimes pressing really hard would make the camera snap a picture, but other times, nothing happened. When a picture could be taken, it is blurry because of the case. I don't have any problem with the leaking or the water seeping into the case.
customer_reviews.author: Linh

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware
customer_reviews.text: I have the iPhone 6 Plus: My phone ended up with water damage, the case didn’t seal properly. I did the paper towel test before using it and followed instructions. I wish I’d spent more and did more research because it cost me more in the end. PS - your phone has a snug fit and can’t have a case on it, so I wouldn’t recommend it for carrying your phone around on your neck. There’s no protection to your phone and the picture quality isn’t good either.
customer_reviews.author: Novelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and stays dry-read review
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t believe how easy this was to use to protect my phone under water. However, my advice is to have video started before you go under the water. Then you can screen shot as you watch video replay. I couldn’t get the touch to work underwater when I was trying to capture pics of corals and fish.
customer_reviews.author: J4Cox

customer_reviews.title: More than worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: WORKED GREAT! On a recent trip to Hawaii we used these for multiple purposes. We could take them out in the water and not leave them on the beach worrying about them being stolen, we used them on the water slides, we took pictures of family members boogie boarding and we used them while snorkeling. The phone touch screen takes a little getting used to when your phone is enclosed in this typed of case but keeping the sand and water from your phone is nothing short of GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's really water proof!!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product. Was skeptical after a bad experience with a water proof pouch that got filled with water. I have a galaxy note 8 and am happy that the phone fits this pouch with the case on! Bc this is a big phone and even bulkier with the case on. But I already submerged it in water and no leaks! Yaaayyy!! I highly recommend to anyone looking for extra water protection for their phone. I mean they're all water resistant for the most part these days, but the extra protection sets me at ease.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive product that works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: This product was used for swimming and snorkeling. Overall it did really well but we couldn’t get it to capture pictures of the coral reef etc underwater. Only videos is what we were able to get cause it wouldn’t allow us to tap the picture button. The neck strap etc seems fairly sturdy for this product and we didn’t have any problems with water leaking into the phone case thank goodness! I’ve seen some of the cases with a floating device inside in case if the cord falls off your neck or something which would be nice to have. This product served its purpose and my only complaint is the touch screen option to get pictures instead of all videos.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Allen

customer_reviews.title: Drunk in a hot tub? You need this.
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I could say this is a good product for the outdoor type but if you’re an average person like me... you’re buying this so you can take all the selfies you want in the hot tub at home or the pool in Cancun. Well drink up because it really does protect your phone when you’ve had a few. The bonus side is how much harder you have to work typing through the protective plastic (it’s a good thing, honest) so you’re more likely to give up on posting a drunk tweet. Trust me... you need this. Just make sure you have a sober friend to help you get it out of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far.
customer_reviews.text: I tested the bag using a Kleenex and putting it in water and manipulating it and such before we ever put our phones in it and the paper remained totally dry. We went kayaking yesterday and used our Joto pouches for the first time. It was great feeling secure in taking our phones with us. The cord can be used to secure the phone to your person or the kayak. I didn't take any pictures while we were kayaking but did take a picture of one of our cats while my phone was it. Everything on the phone works. You can hear through it and you and easily use the touch screen on your phone. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for several of these. They fit an iphone X along with a few credit cacrds and a few dollar bills. the iphone is in a lifeproof case that does not need to be removed. You cannot access phone in case. This is so that we don't have to pay $20 for a locker at the waterpark. We go several times a year and this saves us hundreds. Great under water in the Lazy River and going down slides. no leaks
customer_reviews.author: capriceclassic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Got this today, inspected, tested it out. Really nice product with impressive reviews, especially the guy who posted about it being in a river for a year and came out unscathed (phone at least). Fits my Galaxy S7 with a battery case which makes my phone much wider. It fits with room to spare. Need this for an upcoming trip which will include salt water activities such as reef snorkeling, etc. Don't expect any problems now. You can actually use this for underwater pictures and videos as the case material is very clear and you have good access to all the buttons. Plus, TS works well in the bag. Home run!
customer_reviews.author: P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, This Thing Works!
customer_reviews.text: I tested it under the water in my sink when I first bought it. I've now gone snorkeling and swimming with it, and it works like a charm! Just remember, it might be easier to set your phone to record before you put it in the bag. Only because, if its sunny, it may be a little hard to see your screen. Also, should you not want to leave your money or cards around, throw them in as well. Everything was bone dry when I pulled it out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof for my Samsung S10 Plus
customer_reviews.text: It's a snug fit with the case I have for my Samsung S10 Plus on, but it does still fit! Without the case on my phone it slides in and out super easy. I've taken it in the ocean, into the pool, into rivers, ponds, all without a problem. I was scared to put my $1200 phone into the water at first, but I tried the paper towel test multiple times, and it came out dry every time. Now I never go to the water without the case. Gives great video for snorkeling and exploring near the water where I couldn't take my phone otherwise. It's cheap and works as advertised, and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Nay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for pool/beach days. It is absolutely amazing! Worth every penny! It keeps the sand out on beach days. And in the pool, it takes crystal clear pics under water. You have full function of your screen and didn't fog up on hot days . Also great for kayaking or canoeing. Love the detachable clip. I bought 2 other without clip and they work, but clip makes it sooooo much nicer. I've used this all summer an no leakage issues at all. The kids(and myself) think this is just a wonderful product. My cousin ended up buying multiple of these for Christmas presents because they were so nice and worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shank

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Before taking them on the water, I took these for a test run by doing the paper towel test in a large pot of water. After weighing them down overnight with a smaller pot lid, these cases came out with the paper towels bone dry. This came a surprise because, quite honestly, I'm a skeptic by nature (especially since the price is relatively cheap!). I took these out on the lake at least 5 times, and every time they kept my/my kayak companion's phones dry. Bonus: the clear plastic film didn't interfere with my phone's touch screen capability nor picture quality. Can't wait to use them when it's kayak season again!
customer_reviews.author: EmmaRee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I spent a whole week in the pool in Cancun with this around my neck and my phone worked perfectly! I was able to take photos without having to take it out of the case. I wasn’t able to get an underwater pic, but this wasn’t intended for that anyway. Highly recommend and would buy it again and again! I’m suggesting that my brother give these out at his beach destination wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca I. Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the water park
customer_reviews.text: We went to a local water park a few weeks ago and I kept seeing people wearing these waterproof phone bags and knew I wanted one right away too. They sold them in the gift shop for over $20!! I found these on Amazon and was super pumped about the price. We went back to the water park yesterday and I got to try it out. It is so cool! I was worried a bit at first about submersing my phone completely but once I did a few times and saw it actually kept my phone dry I took a bunch of underwater photos and videos. The pictures were extremely clear and it was easy to still use my touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: starshine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for conference calls while I paddle on the ocean
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Conference calls when I SUP! Bought this to keep my iPhone protected during early-morning SUP. The bag has been splashed & dipped into the ocean - not problem with leaks & the touch screen works great for answering calls, texts & taking video & pictures. Like any plastic case, it’s obviously not intended to last for years - to be safe, plan to replace every 6 months or so. I’m also not planning to swim underwater with it, but I do not fear my bagged phone getting dunked in salt water. Great price, and nice to know I can sneak away to paddle & still take a business call or text.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bohemian

customer_reviews.title: A+++ Case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to take with me on my Carribbean Cruise. Let me tell you... I’ve seen cases like this in stores for $30! Don’t waste your money on those expenses cases! This one is amazing! I kept my phone in it with some spare cash and a couple credit cards when I swam in the Caribbean because I didn’t want to leave my valuables at my chair while I swam. This worked perfectly and amazingly. I took several underwater photos and videos with just my iPhone 8 secure inside this. It also picked up sound underwater! I received many compliments of the quality of my videos underwater in this case.
customer_reviews.author: cquinn300

customer_reviews.title: Fits iPhone 11 Pro max
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but I didn’t see many iPhone 11 Pro Max comments. It fit mines just fine and I have a thin case on it that I bought from amazon. Has room for id n debit card.
customer_reviews.author: Deez

customer_reviews.title: Great case, junk lanyard.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case, lanyard needs thrown out as soon as product arrives. I have had no issues with the case and it has kept my phone dry on rainy runs. The case fits my iPhone 7 with a battery case attachment fine. The lanyard is junk an I would not trust it for use in any scenario. The attachment material to the case and the actual lanyard are to thin and do not feel like they will hold up to most activity. Replace the lanyard and you have an excellent product! The touch screen capabilities are great while the phone is in the case and has presented no issues.
customer_reviews.author: John Braun

customer_reviews.title: It's not universal
customer_reviews.text: The phone in question is a Galaxy 9+ and it doesn't work. If you don't have a cover on your phone then this bag might work. I put my phone in my cargo pants pocket when I take my walks and I want to protect my lens and keep it dry. A protective cover obviously keeps the lens open so the user can take photos but it can collect moisture because it's exposed. I wanted a bag that would protect my investment but this one doesn't come near to a proper fit and I am not about to remove the protective case every time I want to walk. Back to a conventional zip loc.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D. Huff

customer_reviews.title: No water damage!
customer_reviews.text: I took this case on a trip to Bora Bora to catch some pics while splashing around in the water. Overall I got some okay pics, but this definitely can't compare to a gopro. Of course right? I did notice that I had a lot of difficulties trying to control my iphone under water, so I had to start the videos before submerging in water. I also noticed that the pictures were more clear if I bent the case to eliminate the gap between the camera lens and phone case. Overall opinion? I still have my iphone, and it hasn't been water damaged! good enough lol.
customer_reviews.author: Foreverjaded

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the water out!
customer_reviews.text: Used this snorkeling as there is nowhere safe to leave your phones on the beach when you both go snorkeling. Kept the water out great. Using the phone was an issue. I had read that the touch screen doesn't work and to use the volume buttons for taking pics. It's super tricky and annoying. If you hold the phone out of the water, then the touch screen works, but once you put it under forget it. When it did take a pic or video, it was awesome, but was not the easiest. However for keeping your phone safe, it's brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: YeahBooks

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: This pouch is a little small for my iPhone 11 Pro and the reason I am only giving 4 stars. It does fine as long as I take my phone case off each time but that is a hassle. I ya e had several of these pouches in the past and have never had to remove my phone case prior to using. But all in all it does what’s it’s supposed to. It’s waterproof and keeps my phone protected even while being submerged in water for long periods of time. I’d suggests getting a case that fits an iPhone 11 Pro Max if you want to keep your case on.
customer_reviews.author: AsMeow

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the water out, but phone can't take pictures underwater
customer_reviews.text: This pouch is great for keeping your device dry. It's also nice that it floats. However, I assumed that I would be able to take photos underwater, and it doesn't work. Once you put the phone in the case underwater, the pressure makes the plastic press on the phone screen, and my phone goes haywire. It's like someone is pressing buttons all over the screen. The one time I was able to get it to work, the picture quality was terrible. I was really disappointed that I couldn't take photos while snorkeling, but I guess that was never promised in the item description. I will probably look for another product that does this.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Schleser

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the JOTO case after reading some other reviews here and, so far, it does what it says. I folded up a paper towel, put it in the case and then dropped the case in a bucket and ran water into the bucket for several minutes. The case was completely submerged and wet. But upon pulling out the paper towel, there wasn’t even a hint of moisture on the inside. Also, I have an iPhone XR and was concerned about the facial recognition, but after putting my phone in the case and testing, everything worked great. Even was able to still take great pictures. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Dry as a bone
customer_reviews.text: I tested this out at first at home with a paper towel and it worked great. My large phone fits in there perfectly. Took it out on the river, and unfortunately we tipped the canoe. My phone was the only thing that stayed dry! My only complaint is that the strap that it comes with doesn't inspire much confidence. The little plastic attachment seems flimsy, so I attached the case to the thicker nylon part of the strap instead.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: No. Just no.
customer_reviews.text: Do you miss early touch screen phones that were pressure sensitive so you had to really press down to get anything to register? Do you want you phone case to have sharp edges? If so then this is the product for you. Since the plastic doesn’t actually sit against the screen you really have to press to do anything. And the edges are sharp enough that they dig into my hands, especially at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Agent_Revenge

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Does It's Job
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical that I could trust a $10 case to keep my phone dry underwater, but it really does work. I used this to take photos in the ocean and cenotes in Tulum, and, although I still tried to keep the pouch above water, my phone did not get wet at all! Photos aren't going to be the best quality, obviously, because there is a plastic layer over the lens, but it is a great, inexpensive option. Keep in mind, flash cannot be used while a phone is inside the case.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Too nervous to try it to its full potential
customer_reviews.text: I wont lie I was too afraid to use this fully submerged. I tested it without my phone and it did well. But I was nervous to actually try it with my phone in water. It worked well at the beach to protect my phone from the sand. The screen was easy to use when in it. The picture quality was not very good but expected. Phone calls were a bit muffled but good enough for the protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica follin

customer_reviews.title: seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I tested this with a paper towel inside first. Submersed the case fully and the paper towel remained totally dry. I have put my phone in it at the beach, but I'm still afraid to fully submerse my phone so I cannot attest to that. I believe my phone would be fine, but it's still a scary risk to take with how expensive phones are. Phone has remained dry when splashed. My only complaint is that I can't use the fingerprint recognition on my Google Pixel phone, but that's really not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Remove Otterbox defender before using with an XR phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but you must remove your cover if you use an Otterbox Xr defender case. I wish they would make this product a bit bigger so when kayaking my husband wouldn't be inconvenienced removing the case of his Otterbox Defender to secure his phone in this bag. Using an Otterbox Xr Symmetry case (sleek style) I could slip my phone into the pouch, still a little snug. I can open the phone, swipe and take pictures. Functionality of the phone is good with the case on. I haven't used the waterproof feature of this phone thankfully so I cannot review on that function.
customer_reviews.author: lokey

customer_reviews.title: Phone with case will not fit
customer_reviews.text: The case seems well made, and I'm sure it will protect the contents from the elements. I'm knocking off one star because my phone (Moto Z Force) has a case and will not fit into the pouch. I then thought this might make a good documents pouch and, while my passport will fit inside, my international drivers license will not. Given the ever growing size of cell phones, these pouches could be made large enough to hold a phone that has a case on it. If you're phone has no case, this will probably work.
customer_reviews.author: Geewiz

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like it, we got it for the Bahamas. The picture quality was great, you would never know it was in the there when taking a picture. The only this was the lenyard come off before we used it but we just tied it on the case and was good and secure. Just becareful with that you don’t wanna lose your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Real Review. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: It's impossible to control the phone under water. I have iPhone 6S Plus and filming under water is not possible since the touch screen is not responding properly. Don't buy if you intend to do diving.
customer_reviews.author: RGold

customer_reviews.title: Water proof
customer_reviews.text: Very water proof... just took it out snorkeling and phone was bone dry. Only suggestion I have is that if you are taking a photo in it instead take a video and go back later a screen shot. Sometimes there will be a glare from the plastic, don’t want to miss that photo! Also works with the otter box on the 6s if anyone wants to know
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Water proof!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Mexico and it has worked great! I would put my phone in this case when we went to the beach, pool, boat rides, and any time we were near water. I used my phone for pictures while in the case and they came out pretty good! I had no trouble unlocking my phone with keypad or face recognition while in the case. The seal was tight and I felt confident in using this case to keep my phone safe. I highly recommend this case! Fair price for amazing quality!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get to use it in water but tested it and used it snowboarding
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this because I wanted to try out paddle boarding and I kayaked a lot this year but never got to put it to the test. I did put a paper towel in it and sealed it up and submerged it in water with no leaking. They recommend doing that anyway because sometimes products are defective it just happens. My Fiance used it for extra protection when he went snowboarding so he could keep it in his coat pocket and not have to worry about it getting wet and it held up. I can't wait to actually use it this summer for more water based activities.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Great on top of the water. Totally waterproof as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Totally waterproof. If you wanted to use this while paddle boarding or kayaking I can promise you your phone will stay dry.If you think this might work while you snorkel think again. Underwater it is nearly impossible to use. There is just enough air in the bag to prevent using the camera buttons. Still not a drop of water in the bag or on the phone. But for a quick trip I didn’t want to make an investment. It didn’t work for my purpose but that’s not the bags fault.
customer_reviews.author: MeandIain

customer_reviews.title: OMG...GREAT INVENTION...REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PURCHASE!! Loved I did not have to worry about getting my phone wet. Toch screen and pics turned out great!! So convenient for trip to Jamaica. Hiked up the entire Dunns Falls (wet wet waterfall) IN the rain, in pool, and ocean with this around my neck without my phone getting wet. I'm horrible at keeping up with my phone and found it to be a convenience even at home and work. Would highly recommend. I made sure to do the test before putting my phone in as well.
customer_reviews.author: C Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but don't expect room for much else
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this for the waterproof feature as such, although that might come in handy some day. And I'll have peace of mind if I ever get to a beach, and near swimming pools. I bought it hoping it would be big enough to accommodate an i7 Plus with a protective case (it is) plus a thin cigarette case (which holds a few cigs and also my driver's license and a credit card when I don't want to carry around a wallet and need to go through security at a concert). The phone fits but nothing else. Great case though.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Cottontail

customer_reviews.title: Covid-19 Phone Protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect my phone at work during the Covid-19 Pandemic (I work in a hospital). I have an IPhone 8+ with an Otterbox case and attached card holder and my phone fits perfectly and works perfectly. Access to side buttons is a little difficult but possible. I will try this out when I go on vacation to determine the waterproof factor.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I was so scared and hesitant to buy this! Accident Prone!
customer_reviews.text: I was so scared and hesitant to buy this for my trip to Hawaii. SO glad I did! This case is awesome so quick and easy to use which made me nervous but it kept my phone safe and dry! I used it in the pool, on the water slide and in the ocean! Best $ spent! I look cray in the video and I had to look around to make sure I wasn't going to hit anyone haha @shanta.marie
customer_reviews.author: Shanta R.

customer_reviews.title: Could not use with phone case on
customer_reviews.text: Used this all summer last year. It held up great. Used at the beach, pool, river, lake, and water park with no leaks. It did get sand in it at the beach which was difficult to clean out. The only thing I really did not like was I had to take my phone case off each time I wanted to use it. If it was bigger to where I did not have to remove my case to use it would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it, and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Fits my S9+ with my thin plastic phone case still on. I would recommend and definitely would purchase again!! It was used as a precaution while on a trip around the ocean for a week and used it briefly underwater and it didn't leak. Used it in the desert also and it keeps the sand out. Pictures and Video are Great through the case sound is good also in the video. Touch screen works through the case without any problems. I really have nothing bad to say about it in the 3 weeks total time it was used just about daily. Still holding up fine ready for another trip.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I need it to do!
customer_reviews.text: I can use my touch screen, but can’t access volume buttons and on-off buttons on the side of my iPhone 7-Plus. It’s fine though since the main thing I bought it for was to protect my phone from splashes and my wet hands when I need to answer my phone, or make a phone call, after quickly getting out of the pool. It’s doing everything I need it to do, plus it’s easy to open and close, and slip my phone in and out, at a very affordable price. I’m pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN W CRANE

customer_reviews.title: Great case. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, these cases kept 3 iPhones dry for hours of swimming with and taking pictures of manatees. Unfortunately they do not allow for underwater picture taking as apparently the water interferes with the touch on the screen. Not too surprising I suppose but this seems like it vould be an opportunity for developing a high tech case. Either way, great case for the price and did what they were supposed to do! An integrated air bladder for flotation would be a nice addition too!
customer_reviews.author: T. Mulpagano

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little turned off when I got this because it was much flimsier that I was expecting, but this thing actually works. Touch screen and camera function fine in it, but I was really impressed by the water resistance. I used it on a trip to Costa Rica and it protected my phone completely during waterfall repelling, ATVing, and hiking through waterfalls. It even stood up to (accidental) full water submersion. The only draw back is that in humid weather it could be quite difficult to get the phone out of the pouch. I would recommend maybe sizing up for your phone because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Loendorf

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 11 Pro Max Verified
customer_reviews.text: Great product, larger than the impression you get from the photos in the description but true to form on size they say its compatible with. Those who cruise will be happy to know there is more than enough room behind the phone for your 3 cards you would carry (ID, Ship Keycard, Credit Card,) plus a little bit of cash. The sleeve itself doesn't "float" but there are floats made for cameras out there that you can attach to this in case the strap fails. I ran the lanyard through the float and attached the floats strap to the case so if one fails it is still attached to my neck via the other.
customer_reviews.author: JMorals

customer_reviews.title: great phone protector, never leaks
customer_reviews.text: these are great we have one for each member of the family. weather it is water parks, pool, Disney, etc. have never had one leak. phone stays completely drive even under adverse conditions. The touch buttons some times aren't as accurate as if not in the case, but overall works. We do notice that it does become difficult to hear someone if you are using the phone while in the holder, because of the plastic muffling, but we make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wall

customer_reviews.title: Fulfilled my needs
customer_reviews.text: Pouch is good quality and satisfied my expectations. Followed directions upon arrival of the pouch and submerged in pot of water with paper towel wrapped phone. Actually forgot about the phone for a couple hours. After checking, the paper towel had a very slight damp spot. deciding it was satisfactory, I went snorkeling with it. Taking pictures was pretty easy with the touch screen and without distortion. Phone was in and under salt water for 60+ minutes and had maybe a drop or 2 of water or condensation in it. Quality product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: seabee

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof 😄
customer_reviews.text: I hadn’t even opened it when I got the email requesting a review; but, I opened it and checked it out. It arrived on time, the paper towel I put in to test it remained dry and when I put my phone in there, I was able to use the touch screen without any problem. I don’t have face recognition. I may not use it often; but, I wanted it in case I go to the water park or lake or someplace like that. It doesn’t appear that I will have any problems and I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It’s definitely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 2nd time buying this product. The 1st time the the side of the pouch came loose after about 20 uses, however it was definitely water resistant until that time. I’m going for round two because of the ease to use your camera while in this pouch. The touch screen works well, the photos are good & my phone survived after we tipped over a hobie cat with this case. My only suggestion to other folks purchasing this pouch would be to use care when entering & removing your phone. The glued plastic sides will come apart if you aren’t somewhat gentle with it or as least mine did.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely water proof - hard to use phone inside case.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to keep my phone safe on water rides in Disney World and Universal. But when I wanted easy access, I had to take it out because it was just too difficult to use the side buttons. The touch screen works, but I found it hard to see through the plastic in full sun. It was tough to take pictures in the case - which was 75% of why I bought it. But I still think it's a great product. My issues could have been operator error, or my stupid Windows phone. I'll upgrade to the real world one of these days.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Del Toro

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof but not very good photos and touch screen mostly doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews you'd expect that your phone magically became an full-blown underwater camera, but that's far from reality. It would probably work better if there was a way to vacuum all the air out so the plastic firmly contacted the lens surface. Even then the image quality would probably only be so-so. The touch screen (iPhone 7 Plus) only worked once in a great while so I only got a few photos. But it was waterproof. Not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: M. Klein

customer_reviews.title: This is the best vacation accessory
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I bought it to use on a cruise with my Samsung Galaxy S7. I was easily able to take great, clear pictures while in the ocean. There was also enough room to insert some cash and credit card so I could keep my valuable with me while in the water. Be sure and do the lead test as directed when you receive this. The cord that comes with this long enough to wear comfortably and I like the way that it hooks onto the loop on the unit so that it can't break off.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Joto is a Derogatory Mexican-Spanish term for a homosexual
customer_reviews.text: The product works great but it also means homosexual in spanish. It didnt even occur to me till later lol... My Girlfriends developed a tear in it which resulted in a small hole. Mine was perfect so i assume she just banged it on something sharp and it popped a small hole. Helped me shoot some cool video snorkeling in Bahamas, you need to make sure the phone is pressed up on the plastic or it will be slightly blurry
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Went water rafting this weekend... Just kidding. It's for my shower.
customer_reviews.text: All these reviews about active people water rafting, theme parking, tubing, snorkeling... Well you know what?? I bought this so I could watch netflix in the shower. So take that! It worked great. Absolutely no water got in. I would suggest, when getting your phone out, instead of holding it upright and pulling out, just hold it upside down and let the phone fall into your hand. It works much better that way.
customer_reviews.author: SsMsP

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 3 days then....
customer_reviews.text: Was originally very happy with this product - could not be better for under $10. However, at the pool yesterday, we were playing and the phone must have gone to about 5ft and water came in. The package was sealed correctly, I made sure and distinctly having to unseal it to let the water out. Ruined a $200 phone. My son was super upset, he thought he did it -and he really didn't Worse still - they replaced not refunded
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect! A tip!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I like to go kayaking, swimming, surfing, etc. I love the water! I always felt so nervous with my phone being in a ziplock. Even if it’s a simple beach day laying in the sand, it’s nice to have this protector. Works perfect! And tested it underwater. I love the neck strap! Super helpful. I’m thinking of attaching my own though because the connecting strap to the phone is really thin! It has been reliable, but I will definitely be using my own lanyard
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Cannot beat this case for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We took these with us on our trip to the Caribbean, being in and out of the ocean, and I'm happy to say that our phones survived! It works about as well as you'd think: Airtight? Check. Can still use the touchscreen? Yes, though the water can make you prone to the touchscreen registering taps in the wrong area... physics, right? Camera clarity? Clear, though the air gap between your phone and the bag, combined with the water on the outside, will naturally cause your image to look a bit hazy when the sun reflects through the water. Is the strap trustworthy? Absolutely. All in all, for the price, you really cannot beat this. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Who Needs A Go Pro?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for all the water excursions on my Disney Cruise. I took hundreds of pics and videos, and you can't even tell the plastic casing is covering the lens. This is a must buy if you want to take pictures with your cell phone in water activities. It also fits and works for the iPhone 7, you could still press the power button through the plastic to turn the screen on and then you just have to turn on assistive touch by going to settings<general<accessibility<assistive touch on. Also another tip: before sealing the phone, make sure to get all the air out so you have a nice snug fit around your phone.
customer_reviews.author: eight1178

customer_reviews.title: Not all that were shipped were the same product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these, a black, a blue, and a green. The black and green are the same item, with JOTO printed on the top. When the black one was tested, it was fully waterproof. When the blue one arrived, it was obvious it is a different item, although it was shipped with the black one in the same package. The material on the blue one is flimsy, it doesn't have the JOTO emblem, and the locking mechanisms are different. I didn't even test it because it does not feel strong enough to hold up to my uses. I returned it and ordered another green.
customer_reviews.author: karynjoy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sealed well for my iphone 6s plus(tested ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, sealed well for my iphone 6s plus(tested with a tissue first), even with a magnet case wore. But it's a bit tricky for my wife's iphone7, since the home button for 7 is pure touch sensor, not like 6s that you can feel pushing down the home button, so not matter how much more pushed, if it cannot sensor your are touching the home button on 7, you cannot start using it. but luckily you can swipe to use the camera easily, which I think should be the most reason you wanna use a phone in water.
customer_reviews.author: S. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I didn’t have high hopes for this. But i was pleasantly surprised at how well they actually protect. We climbed Dunes river falls in Jamaica. If you’ve ever done it you know theres no staying dry. These cases performed exceptionally well. Not one drop of water in any if the three we purchased. We also used them when at the oool and beach without any issues. I highly recommend them. Im always hesitant on waterproof anything for our phones but these have proven to protect.
customer_reviews.author: RI

customer_reviews.title: Nearly impossible to take photos underwater with this thing. ...
customer_reviews.text: Nearly impossible to take photos underwater with this thing. We bought it for our vacation in Hawaii for snorkeling and you would have to press the video button above water and then take it under if​ you wanted to record something. Taking pictures was basically impossible. Even then the video wasn't very clear and had a fog look to it. No water got into the case though which is why I gave it two stars so in a way it did its job but at the same time whats the point if you cant get the photos you want.
customer_reviews.author: Carlee Tatum

customer_reviews.title: He felt around in the mud with his foot until he found it and the iPhone was still in perfect shape. I would recommend this product to anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag while on vacation recently. It was put to the test when my brother accidentally dropped my iPhone into the Hanalei river and it sunk to the bottom. He felt around in the mud with his foot until he found it and the iPhone was still in perfect shape. I would recommend this product to anyone but would also suggest adding a floatation device. Amazon sells a nice wrist strap that also acts as a floatation device.
customer_reviews.author: D. Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Great product but overheats phone
customer_reviews.text: I love how this case keeps the phone dry and allows you to manipulate your phone to take photos when kayaking without taking it out of the case; however, I have been unable to keep it closeby me (around my neck with the strap) for very long because of the "Iowa" heat. It shuts my phone down because the phone gets too hot inside the case. I'm fine if I put it in the case and then put it in a dry pack under my kayak's cockpit.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be able to use this on the beach for my iPhone X and it exceeded my expectations. The touch screen works perfectly and I like that the face recognition can be used with this as well. I was thinking I would have to use my passcode which wouldn’t have been a problem, I was just very impressed that I could use the face recognition with it. It didn’t let any sand or water in so my phone stayed safe, and it was a pretty cheap! I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS! I tested it before putting my phone inside (By submerging it in water for hours). The clips are easy to open and close. No issues. Only issue was that I couldn’t fit my phone in it with the case on. I had to take off the case, which was fine with me. Necklace strap was secure, no issues! I loved it for my vacation. It survived snorkeling in the ocean, dunns river falls, ziplining, parasailing, etc. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BumpyKnucklez

customer_reviews.title: Samsung S7 buttons all worked , easy to seal, passed a sink test, good photo clarity
customer_reviews.text: The product fits my Samsung S7 with the Otterbox Symmetry case. The 2 push-thru & push-down latches that secure the top are easy to operate. All of my phone buttons operate normally. The photo I took thru the case was hard to distinguish from the one taken out of the case. This will probably be true as long as the case doesn't get scratched. The lanyard is long enough to operate the phone without taking it off. The case passed a basic sink submersion test stuffed with tissues. I would be careful to dry the outside of the case thoroughly before opening it.
customer_reviews.author: RayD

customer_reviews.title: Nice see through waterproof case
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for my phone for when I go kayaking. Per the instructions when I got it I tested it by placing a piece of paper in it and placing it under water. I left it submerged in 12 inches of water for 3 minutes and the paper came out dry. It should work well for my kayak trips. I liked it so much that I bought a second on for my wife. When I first got it I was a little confused on how the locking mechanism worked but once figured out it works great. The plastic is nice and clear so you can take pictures thru it without taking the phone out. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morris

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: I tested this by submerging my phone in the sink and it seems to work well. Not a single drop of water got inside after a few minutes. Not sure I would trust it for longer amounts of time underwater though. Great for taking underwater pictures, and just in case your phone falls off your boat/ kayak. I suggest you also buy a floaty ring/wristlet to attach to your phone so it will float, some other waterproof pouches have them included.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Worked - to a point
customer_reviews.text: Worked to keep the phone dry - check. The audio crinkling visibly in the underwater video was terrible. And the photo screen is obscured by sunniness which made it hard to see if you were taking the right photo(s). Definitely have to use the buttons on a phone instead of the touchscreen underwater. Also wish the strap was tighter around a wrist or similar - the one in the bag only deals with a necklace length.
customer_reviews.author: Fargo

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Kept the water out for the short time I used it. It was unusable due to the fact the pictures taken through the plastic were soooo blurry! No matter how I tried to clean the plastic and the camera lense, how tight or loose I made the case, the pictures were useless. I ended up just putting cash and credit card in it instead. Useless. I've had a different brand in the past that worked perfectly, but sadly this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Jdjh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for the cruise me and my boyfriend went on. We used it underwater, while we were in the water taking pictures and videos of the family. It was the most convenient thing we hav this was perfect for the cruise me and my boyfriend went on. We used it under water, while we were in the water taken pictures and videos of the family. It was the most convenient thing we had. It was a Caribbean cruise so we were constantly buy water so I wore it as a necklace and just kept it all me at all times. Takes pictures and videos while wet perfectly
customer_reviews.author: lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Great color! Didn’t leak
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Did the water test. Left in my tub for 6 hours. Not a drop of water inside. Every now and then while it was in the tub I would push it down and move it around and try to be a little rough with it. No water got it . The little string on the lanyard is a joke. I just hooked the actual lanyard through the hole and tied it. Great color! Update: took on a seven day vacation. Did lots of water activities and pool time. This did a great job keeping the water out but the pictures didn’t come out clear as the case got foggy inside many times.
customer_reviews.author: deonicio h.

customer_reviews.title: This is really awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter-in-law because her children are little fish, living in the pool this summer. She has used this daily for music in the pool, answering calls and taking photos under water. The photos come out good, not perfect yet still good enough to post. The touch screen still highly responsive through the bag. I do believe she even played a couple of games while in the pool with her phone. This was a great purchase for us - I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melody L. Moris

customer_reviews.title: Best Waterproof iPhone Case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a family trip and knew we would be in water for most of the day. This has to be the best waterproof product out there for an iPhone because we all used it and no water ever got into the case. The price was so cheap, which made me a little afraid at first, but I just purchased it and was so amazed by the quality of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kr2009al

customer_reviews.title: Water went in my case and ruined my iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product zero or negative stars, I would. The item worked fine when I tested it with a paper inside as per the instructions. However, once my iPhone was in the pouch and I went in the [beach] water (the reason I purchased it), water went in the pouch and my phone died. I spent the rest of my vacation without a phone and unable to document my activities with photos. What's worse, I had to purchase a new phone upon returning from my trip. I would recommend you choose a different product/seller and pay a bit more to guarantee your phone is not damaged with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG it really works
customer_reviews.text: When I think about putting my phone in a baggie and going snorkeling, I shudder to think of the damage I'd sustain. Imagine my surprise when I received this - it comes with instructions on how to test its waterproofness, and sure enough I put a paper towel in this and submerged it for 30 minutes. Paper towel came out bone dry! Took this with me on a Caribbean vacation and my phone was in it in the water taking photos like nobody's business. Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: gravity

customer_reviews.title: Good pouch, horrible close/open/seal system
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof case worked well and kept my phone dry on a 7-day Western Caribbean cruise. The only improvement I would suggest, and something that irritated me as using, is to improve the closure system. The current tabs used to open, close, and seal the pouch are difficult to use. If you chew your fingernails and often don’t have long fingernails, good luck opening this. I had to get something to pry the tabs up enough to grab and open completely. Other than the closure system, this worked well for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Pidasso

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit & user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This case does the trick for me on our paddle trips. My Note 9 fits snugly and I can comfortably use all my phones features thru the plastic film. The lock system appears tight and effective.... although I haven't dropped it in the water..... and hope not to in the future.....having this case makes me feel confident to have my phone w/me for photos and emergency's while on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very well made I did a waterproof test in the sink with some paper towels in it and they came out perfectly dry. The touch screen works perfectly while my Essential PH-1 phone is in the waterproof case but unfortunately the fingerprint reader does not so I'll just have to unlock it with the PIN code. A minor inconvenience to ensure that my phone is protected from water damage.
customer_reviews.author: Spectre

customer_reviews.title: Pouch damaged in the first attempt only
customer_reviews.text: Went to Havasupai last month and used this pouch to protect my iPhone XS, all of sudden after 2-3 miles of walking, when I didn’t even use that much, the thread connecting the pouch broke and my iPhone almost fell into the creek water. I somehow saved it or the current was very strong and it wouldn’t have been possible to get it back. They should fix it before someone loses their cellphone.
customer_reviews.author: Prasad F

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews for the best waterproof iPhone case, I was sold and bought the Catalyst for about 30 bucks, did the water test...it leaked! After reading other reviews I bought the Impactstrong waterproof iPhone case for about 20 bucks, did the water test...it leaked! Decided that maybe my iPhone shouldn't be underwater anyway so bought the JOTO Universal Waterproof Pouch just to protect my phone while on a boat or at the beach. I figured for about 9 bucks it would be worth it. Did the water test and absolutely NO LEAKS! Maybe I will take underwater pics.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: JOTO: This item isn't eligible for return
customer_reviews.text: I am an Amazon Prime member. I had to return another item that was on the same order as this case from JOTO. I noticed on the returns page that this case displays a yellow triangle and the words: This item isn't eligible for return. One of the reviewers had recommended testing this case with paper towels inside. I overstuffed the case with paper towels and kept it submerged in the sink while the tap water was running over it. The case passed the test and did not leak. I have not used this case with the iPhone as of this writing.
customer_reviews.author: NaySay

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This case works well. It's nice to be able to hang your phone around your neck. There's room to place you credit cards and cash behind your phone in the case. The only hard part is getting out all the air when you seal the case. Air bubbles get stuck, and then it's harder to use the touchscreen. But this is especially useful to use in places like waterparks, theme parks, and the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckie Beamon

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This pouch worked perfect for paddle boarding. The touch screen was just as if I didn't have my phone in a pouch! I was impressed! It fit my iPhone 8 perfect too and although I didn't drop it in the water to test the "waterproofness", it did appear to be air tight and I trust that if it did fall in, it would be protected. I am very happy with the product and the price makes it even better!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Matsubara

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t leak.
customer_reviews.text: So this was purchased for a upcoming cruise. Before I had a chance to use this it’s been used twice by others. Both times it’s done what they say it does and what it doesn’t. Camera needs to be used with actual buttons underwater. Works like normal above water using the flash reflects and makes a blue haze. It keeps stuff inside absolutely dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something waterproof for my phone, so I could take pictures while snorkeling. This worked great for the most part. It was completely waterproof! I found out if I left air in the pouch the camera worked great. If there wasn’t any air once I was under water the camera wouldn’t let me take pictures because it sealed tight and for some reason didn’t register my finger pressing against it. I would highly recommend especially for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Clark W

customer_reviews.title: Be careful opening the pouch as if you pull too hard you can rip the seams.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this recently hoping to use it while visiting the Blue Lagoon in Iceland. The flyer insert in the product say not to be used in water above 30C. Well that defeats the purpose as hot springs average temperature is 37-39C. Wish I knew about this in the product description before hand. But I will keep it since I can always find a use for it at the beach. I tested it and so far no leaking. Be extra vigilant when opening the top as if you pull too hard I think you might rip the seams where the latch is.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lin

product_meta.title: JOTO Universal Waterproof Pouch Cellphone Dry Bag Case for iPhone 11 Pro Max Xs Max XR X 8 7 6S Plus SE, Galaxy S20 Ultra S20+ S10 Plus S10e S9 Plus S8/Note 10+ 9, Pixel 4 XL up to 6.9" -Black
feature_bullets: Universal waterproof case dry bag fits all smartphones up to 6.8" diagonal size, Certain big screen phones need to remove protective case. Credit card wallet money waterproof dry bag for beach, pools, fishing, swimming, boating, kayaking, snorkeling and water park activities
Clear Window on both front and back sides, perfect for taking pictures, videos and checking emails
100 feet IPX8 Certified waterproof; Offers waterproof / snowproof / dirtproof protection for your device while maintaining full touch screen functionality
Compatible with devices up to 101mm x 175mm (clear window 70mm X 140mm); Comes with a neck strap for convenient carrying
Features a simple snap and lock access, easy to keep out water, snow, dust, sand, and dirt

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars39,416 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Universal compatible for device up to 6", Waterproof, snowproof, dirtproof, dustproof, sandproof, water-tight
specifications.Included Components: Dry Wipe, Nano Liquid Screen Protector, Wet Wipe
